#summary Current dependencies needed for building the client.

= Introduction =

Below is the list of dependencies required to build the client. These should easily be available for most platforms.


= Details =

  * [http://www.libsdl.org SDL]
  * [http://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_image SDL_image]
  * [http://enet.bespin.org enet]
  * [http://www.grinninglizard.com/tinyxml tinyxml]
  * [http://libagar.org agar]
  * [http://www.freetype.org FreeType 2]
  * [http://www.zlib.net zlib]
  * [http://www.icculus.org/physfs physfs]
  * [http://curl.haxx.se libcurl]
  * [http://www.openssl.org openssl]
